title: upgrade-to-quarkus3 jbang script | switch/case issues

labels.name: area/jbang
labels.description: Issues related to when using jbang.dev with Quarkus

body:
### Describe the bug

Using the Quarkus 3 migration script acc. to https://quarkus.io/blog/quarkus-3-0-0-beta1-released/#automated-migration rewrote switch expressions (Java 19 with preview-features):

Git diff before/after running `jbang --fresh upgrade-to-quarkus3@quarkusio`:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40993644/227792170-a694cd60-d915-4a46-bdcc-26e49287a742.png)


### Expected behavior

Switch expressions keep untouched.

### Actual behavior

Switch expressions gone wild.

### How to Reproduce?

Migrate a Quarkus 2.16 app using Java 19 with preview-features that contains switch expressions with pattern matching to Quarkus 3 using the jbang migration script.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux fedora 6.2.7-200.fc37.x86_64 #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Fri Mar 17 16:16:00 UTC 2023 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "19" 2022-09-20 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-19+36 (build 19+36) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-19+36 (build 19+36, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

not used

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.16.5 to 3.0.0.Alpha5

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.7 (b89d5959fcde851dcb1c8946a785a163f14e1e29)

### Additional information

Thanks for the Quarkus-Experience!
